entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
